title: Brighton SEO Live Blog
description: Follow along for talk takeaways, tips, and try-hard witty remarks.
content: Joshua Hardwick Head of Content @ Ahrefs (or, in plain English, I'm the guy responsible for ensuring that every blog post we publish is EPIC). Get the week's best marketing content Email Subscription Subscribe Leave this field empty if you're human: Contents Hello everyone. It’s April again, so I’m back in Brighton for another two days of sun, sea, and SEO!Being the introvert I am, my idea of fun isn’t hanging around our booth all day explaining we’ve run out of t-shirts (seriously, you need to be fast if you want swag!). So I decided to do something useful and live-blog the event instead.Follow below for talk takeaways and (very) mildly humorous commentary. Get the week's best marketing content Email Subscription Subscribe Leave this field empty if you're human: Article by Joshua Hardwick Head of Content @ Ahrefs (or, in plain English, I'm the guy responsible for ensuring that every blog post we publish is EPIC). Keep Learning Steal Our SEO Report Template (Inspired by SEO Experts) Not sure how to create the perfect SEO report? Steal our SEO report template and make it even better as we go through it slide by slide. Is Wix Good for SEO? Here’s Everything to Know About Wix SEO Whether you have a Wix site or are still deciding on a CMS, it's important to know how Wix can impact your SEO. How to Use Yoast SEO to Improve SEO Yoast SEO is a popular WordPress plugin that helps you optimize blog posts for SEO. Learn more about how it works and its key features. Continuous SEO: Can You “Complete” SEO? Can you really “complete” SEO, or should it be continuous? We'll answer that, plus share tips for implementing a continuous SEO strategy. Quick SEO: 8 Ways to Accelerate SEO Results From Months to Days Think all SEO progress is slow as molasses? Think again.
author: Joshua Hardwick
